system_description: A personal finance dashboard that allows users to log income and expenses, set saving goals, create budgets, and view financial analytics, through charts and summaries.

functional_requirements.title: Income Logging
functional_requirements.description: The system should allow users to log their income in a structured format.

functional_requirements.title: Expense Logging
functional_requirements.description: The system should allow users to log their expenses in a structured format.

functional_requirements.title: Saving Goal Setting
functional_requirements.description: The system should allow users to set financial saving goals.

functional_requirements.title: Budget Creation
functional_requirements.description: The system should allow users to create and manage their budgets.

functional_requirements.title: Financial Analytics
functional_requirements.description: The system should provide users with financial analytics through charts and summaries.

non_functional_requirements.title: Performance
non_functional_requirements.description: The system should be able to handle a large number of concurrent users without performance degradation.

non_functional_requirements.title: Security
non_functional_requirements.description: The system should be secure and protect user data from unauthorized access.

non_functional_requirements.title: Usability
non_functional_requirements.description: The system should be easy to use and understand.

non_functional_requirements.title: Reliability
non_functional_requirements.description: The system should be reliable and available for use at all times.
